There were no other sightings in Toledo on or around September 10th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing in my backyard as usual looking up at the sky, when I saw a very bright star like object slowly moving across the sky. I have seen this object for the past three nights. The first two nights they were in pairs. The 3rd night it was a single light. I did not think it was a plane because there was no sound and had no flashing navigation lights. All three nights that I seen these objects, they were traveling West to the East. As the object floated across the sky, I lost sight of it due to the houses in the distance. I truly felt as though I have witnessed something miraculous.
Summary: bright, non-flashing lights moving across the sky
